page.title: 13A Saturday on the Farm
page.content: by Sharon Holloway (Aged 10yrs) I wake up with my sister Rachael, after we have dressed we go into the kitchen with our Mum and Dad it is 5.00 am .We have a cake and a drink of orange squash.At 5.10 am Rachael goes up the farm and washes the parlour down while I get the cows in.When they are in Dad gets the cow cake ready for the calves. Rachael feeds four calves I feed two calves while Dad beds them up .Next we fill a wheelbarrow with silage which we give to the calves. When we go in Anne, my little sister, is awake we play with her then we have breakfast at 8.30 am. Dad comes in at 9.00 am.We go out to play until dinner at 1.00 pm.We usually play horse jumping. After dinner we play in our hut which is an old chicken hut on wheels.Dad has been cleaning the yard
